name: Levinton et al., Appellants, v. North Branch Fire Ins. Co.
name_abbreviation: Levinton v. North Branch Fire Ins.

judges: Before Brown, C. J., Moschzisker, Walling, Simpson and Kephart, JJ.
parties: Levinton et al., Appellants, v. North Branch Fire Ins. Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Kephart,
For tbe reasons given in tbe opinion, tbis day filed, in tbe case of William and J. Levinton, trading as Union Novelty Manufacturing Company, Appellant, v. Tbe Obio Farmers Insurance Company of Le Roy, Obio, tbe judgment of tbe court below is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Kephart,

casebody.head_matter:
Levinton et al., Appellants, v. North Branch Fire Ins. Co.
Argued March 25, 1920.
Appeal, No. 280, Jan. T., 1920, from judgment of O. P. No. 2, of Phila. Co., Dec. T., 1918, No. 4353, refusing to take off nonsuit, in case of Levinton et al., trading as Union Novelty Mfg. Co., v. North Branch Fire Ins. Co.
Before Brown, C. J., Moschzisker, Walling, Simpson and Kephart, JJ.
Affirmed.
May 26, 1920:
